app.appName: Adafruit SGP30 Air Quality Sensor Breakout - VOC and eCO2
app.desc: This is an air quality sensor, for measuring gas and VOCs (Volatile Organic Compounds). It can measure eCO2 (equivalent calculated carbon-dioxide) concentration between 0 to 60,000 ppm (parts per million), and TVOC (Total Volatile Organic Compound) concentration between 0 to 60,000 ppb (parts per billion).
